item.description:
We will attend the League of NH Craftsmen's Fair at Sunapee State Park. Fair hours are 10 - 5, so we will have a Pot Luck Brunch at my house at 10:00 and head over to the fair by 11:30. Fair details can be seen at

League of NH Craftsmen's Fair

Online Special through July 31 - $2 Discount on all tickets: Purchase your Tickets to the 76th Annual Craftsmens Fair by July 31 and save $2 on each ticket: Discount price, Adults $8, Senior/Student $6. Or buy full price ticket at the gate (expect a long line!).

If you have never been to this Fair, the crafts are high quality, beautiful items.
I will supply plates, cups & utensils and mimosas. Bring a beverage if you would like something else and a brunch dish to share and a lawn chair - we'll picnic in the yard. Rain Date: Sunday, 8/2

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: League of NH Craftmen's Fair at Sunapee State Park
